name: Trinity College Dublin
shortDesc: Historic university with the Book of Kells.
tips: Go early to avoid queues. Walk around College Green.

name: Guinness Storehouse
shortDesc: Ireland’s iconic brewery experience with skyline views.
tips: Book tickets online for faster entry.

name: Phoenix Park
shortDesc: One of Europe’s largest city parks—often with deer!
tips: Best in the morning; bring water and comfy shoes.

name: Temple Bar
shortDesc: Famous area for pubs, street music, and vibes.
tips: Great for photos; can be busy at night.
